knowledge_prompt: Deleting G 7.9% means removing the part related to G, so it is expected that the section of G in the pie chart will also be deleted, and the proportions of the remaining parts should change accordingly.Because G originally accounted for 7.9%, after removing G, the remaining 92.1% needs to be recalculated for A, B, C, D, E, and F. For example, A's new proportion is 21.2% รท 92.1% = 23%, and the new proportions of the others B, C, D, E, and F are calculated in the same way.
